title: Texas School Shooting Renews Battle Over Gun Laws
itunes:title: Texas School Shooting Renews Battle Over Gun Laws
description:
June Grasso speaks to Second Amendment experts Joseph Blocher of Duke Law School and Jeffrey Fagan of Columbia Law School about the tragic mass shooting at an elementary school in Texas and the calls for common sense gun control laws.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
